name: Fishing Fangame
description:
This is a fan game I made. Its based off the game Fishing Barents Sea on Steam. None of these ideas are mine, and if you think this is kinda cool you should definitely check out Fishing Barents Sea on Steam. https://store.steampowered.com/app/501080/

Its made for a 1600*900 screen resolution so you might not see everything if u have the wrong resolution. Go left to reach the fish shop to sell fish.(just click on the building)
